sentences.en: A simple alloy of nickel and titanium nitinol has some perplexing properties.
sentences.cn: 作为镍和钛的简单的一种合金,镍钛诺具有一些令人惊叹的特征.

sentences.en: At first sight, the result has a rather perplexing geometry.
sentences.cn: 乍看上去, 整体建筑有着错综复杂的几何外形.

sentences.en: British Parliamentary procedure is perplexing at the best of times.
sentences.cn: 即使在最好情况下，英国议会的程序也很费解。

sentences.en: But how lightning manages to accelerate these electrons is extremely perplexing.
sentences.cn: 然而,闪电如何使这些电子加速,却极为令人费解.

sentences.en: He was determined to find answers to life's most perplexing questions.
sentences.cn: 他决心找到答案,那个生命中最令人困惑的问题.

sentences.en: His demeanour had a kind of melancholy which was perplexing.
sentences.cn: 他的行为有抑郁倾向,令人困惑.

sentences.en: I do not know where family doctors acquired illegiBly perplexing handwriting.
sentences.cn: 我不知道家庭医生从哪儿学来的那种看不明白、令人迷惑的书法.

sentences.en: It took years to understand many perplexing diseases.
sentences.cn: 许多疑难病症要耗时数年才能搞明白。

sentences.en: The biggest black holes in the universe are also the most perplexing.
sentences.cn: 宇宙中最大的黑洞也是最令人不解的.

sentences.en: The issues we have raised in this section are among the most perplexing in economics.
sentences.cn: 本节我们所讨论的这些问题是经济学中最错综复杂的问题.

sentences.en: The problems it created were very perplexing.
sentences.cn: 它所造成的问题是十分复杂的.

sentences.en: The warmth and friendliness he felt toward him now were perplexing.
sentences.cn: 他不明白这会儿对他这样亲切这样友好.

sentences.en: The whole affair is very perplexing.
sentences.cn: 整件事令人感到莫名其妙.

sentences.en: This might seem very perplexing to those who know nothing about it.
sentences.cn: 这对那些对它一无所知的人来说可能显得很难理解.

sentences.en: To start a family sometimes could be perplexing or complicated.
sentences.cn: 成个家有时是件困惑或复杂的事.

words.tran_cn: 使困惑，使为难；使复杂化
复杂的，令人费解的；令人困惑的

trans.tran_cn: 使人困惑的，令人费解的
trans.tran_en: If you find something perplexing, you do not understand it or do not know how to deal with it

trans.tran_cn: 使迷惑，使混乱( perplex的现在分词 )
